name: Massacre: Tactics
description:
You are the king slayer!
You are the enemy of humanity!
And you are oh so undecided
You are the barbarians!

Raze 7 cities and slaughter the kings to dominate lost lands

CONTROLS
  • WASD to Camera Movement
  • Left Mouse Click to interact
  • Click on self to skip turn
